title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practice Competencies: e-Learning Media Utilization Project for Elementary Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory, understanding of secondary curricula, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Development of three types of science curriculum projects for elementary students by applying e-learning media design principles.
Design of two formative assessment tools for measuring learner engagement, tailored to PBL (Project-Based Learning) environments.
Acquisition of responsive e-learning content development skills applicable in BYOD environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
